name: One Last Ride
description:
After the Endless Drought, humans have become an endangered species, and the fight for survival has become a troublesome routine.

The gathering missions have turned into suicide, but they are vital for the endurance of your village. As one of its expert drivers, you have to venture into the abandoned city nearby to find resources that could help your people endure.

Made in a weekend for the CoronavirusGameJam2!

3D Graphics - Eduardo Rodrigo

  • instagram.com/eddhaur3d
  • artstation.com/eddhaur

2D Graphics - San Gómez

  • instagram.com/art.of.brava
